dcterms:creator: R. Mur-Artal
J. M. M. Montiel
J. D. Tardos
dcterms:description: The KITTI Visual Odometry / SLAM Evaluation benchmark consists of 22 stereo sequences, where each image is saved as png format. It provides 11 sequences with ground truth trajectories for training and verification, and the other 11 sequences without ground truth are utilized for testing.
dcterms:title: KITTI Visual Odometry / SLAM Evaluation dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Qin
P. Li
S. Shen
dcterms:description: The ETH-asl cla dataset is collected by drones and consists of four sequences, including cla_floor_f, cla_floor_f_v2, cla_floor_g, and cla_floor_j. The dataset is characterized by severe jitter, presenting a challenge for pose estimation.
dcterms:title: ETH-asl cla dataset
